EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_MS-NetflixOSS-Spring Cloud_Seroter_Q316.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading our white paper!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Standing on the Shoulders of Giants: Supercharging Your Microservices with NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud white paper. We hope you found it informative and helpful as you explore technology options for your digital transformation journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- Video: Help Developers Do What They Love <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdw_9dADM-4]]> - Podcast: The microservices substrate - NetflixOSS, Spring Cloud Services, and Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/the-microservices-substrate-netflixoss-spring-cloud-services-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> - Analyst Report: Spring Boot Simplifies End-to-End Development <[[https://pivotal.io/spring-boot-simplifies-end-to-end-development]]> - Blog: A Look At Spring Cloud Services For Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-perspectives/features/a-look-at-spring-cloud-services-for-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> - Learn more about Spring <[[https://spring.io/]]> - Learn more about NetflixOSS <[[https://netflix.github.io/]]> - Learn more about Spring Cloud Netflix <[[https://cloud.spring.io/spring-cloud-netflix/]]>
If you would like more information or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, donâ€™t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team For in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email-confirmation&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=asset-download-confirmation]]>, taking place December 4-7, 2017 in San Francisco.
